languages.text: "Подавляющее большинство едва обнаруживших себя псайкеров отличаются крайней неуправляемостью и нестабильностью. Я не был исключением... впрочем, я дожил до прибытия {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Черного корабля{/g} на наш мир, а значит, все же доставлял не слишком много неприятностей моим тюремщикам".

"The vast majority of newly discovered psykers are extremely uncontrollable and unstable. I was no exception... However, I lived to see the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to our world, which means I did not cause my jailers too much trouble, all things considered."
languages.original_text: "Подавляющее большинство едва обнаруживших себя псайкеров отличаются крайней неуправляемостью и нестабильностью. Я не был исключением... впрочем, я дожил до прибытия {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Черного корабля{/g} на наш мир, а значит, все же доставлял не слишком много неприятностей моим тюремщикам".

traits.locale_text: "The vast majority of newly discovered psykers are extremely uncontrollable and unstable. I was no exception... However, I lived to see the arrival of the Black Ship to our world, which means I did not cause my jailers too much trouble, all things considered."

"The vast majority of newly discovered psykers are extremely uncontrollable and unstable. I was no exception... However, I lived to see the arrival of the Black Ship to our world, which means I did not cause my jailers too much trouble, all things considered."

"The vast majority of newly discovered psykers are extremely uncontrollable and unstable. I was no exception... However, I lived to see the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to our world, which means I did not cause my jailers too much trouble, all things considered."

languages.text: “绝大多数刚刚觉醒的灵能者都极其不稳定、极其危险，我当时也不例外……但即便如此，我都成功地在{g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}黑船{/g}上活了下来，抵达了我们的世界。这意味着，我并没有给那些看守造成太大的麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "The vast majority of newly discovered psykers are extremely uncontrollable and unstable. I was no exception... However, I lived to see the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to our world, which means I did not cause my jailers too much trouble, all things considered."

traits.locale_text: “绝大多数刚刚觉醒的灵能者都极其不稳定、极其危险，我当时也不例外……但即便如此，我都成功地在{g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}黑船{/g}上活了下来，抵达了我们的世界。这意味着，我并没有给那些看守造成太大的麻烦。”

languages.original_text: "The vast majority of newly discovered psykers are extremely uncontrollable and unstable. I was no exception... However, I lived to see the arrival of the Black Ship to our world, which means I did not cause my jailers too much trouble, all things considered."

languages.text: «La gran mayoría de los psíquicos recién descubiertos son absolutamente incontrolables e inestables. No fui ninguna excepción... pero sobreviví para ver la llegada de la {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Nave Negra{/g} a nuestro mundo, por lo que no causé tantos problemas a mis captores como cabría esperar».
languages.original_text: "The vast majority of newly discovered psykers are extremely uncontrollable and unstable. I was no exception... However, I lived to see the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to our world, which means I did not cause my jailers too much trouble, all things considered."

traits.locale_text: «La gran mayoría de los psíquicos recién descubiertos son absolutamente incontrolables e inestables. No fui ninguna excepción... pero sobreviví para ver la llegada de la {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Nave Negra{/g} a nuestro mundo, por lo que no causé tantos problemas a mis captores como cabría esperar».

languages.text: 「新しく発見された異能者の大半は、極めて制御不能で不安定だ。私も例外ではなかった。しかし、私は{g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}〈黒き御船〉{/g}が我々の惑星に到着するまで生きていた。これはすなわち、私は己の看守にそれほど迷惑をかけなかったということだ」
languages.original_text: "The vast majority of newly discovered psykers are extremely uncontrollable and unstable. I was no exception... However, I lived to see the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to our world, which means I did not cause my jailers too much trouble, all things considered."

traits.locale_text: 「新しく発見された異能者の大半は、極めて制御不能で不安定だ。私も例外ではなかった。しかし、私は{g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}〈黒き御船〉{/g}が我々の惑星に到着するまで生きていた。これはすなわち、私は己の看守にそれほど迷惑をかけなかったということだ」

languages.text: "Die gewaltige Mehrheit der neu entdeckten Psioniker sind extrem unkontrollierbar und instabil. Ich war keine Ausnahme ... Doch ich habe lange genug überlebt, um die Ankunft des {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Schwarzen Schiffs{/g} auf unserer Welt zu überleben. Ich habe meinen Wärtern also nicht allzu viel Ärger bereitet, alles in allem."
languages.original_text: "The vast majority of newly discovered psykers are extremely uncontrollable and unstable. I was no exception... However, I lived to see the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to our world, which means I did not cause my jailers too much trouble, all things considered."

traits.locale_text: "Die gewaltige Mehrheit der neu entdeckten Psioniker sind extrem unkontrollierbar und instabil. Ich war keine Ausnahme ... Doch ich habe lange genug überlebt, um die Ankunft des {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Schwarzen Schiffs{/g} auf unserer Welt zu überleben. Ich habe meinen Wärtern also nicht allzu viel Ärger bereitet, alles in allem."

languages.text: « La grande majorité des psykers, lorsqu'ils découvrent leurs pouvoirs, sont en effet incontrôlables et instables. Je n'ai pas fait exception à la règle... J'ai néanmoins survécu jusqu'à l'arrivée du {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Vaisseau Noir{/g} sur notre monde, ce qui veut bien dire que, tout compte fait, je n'ai pas causé trop d'ennuis à mes geôliers. »
languages.original_text: "The vast majority of newly discovered psykers are extremely uncontrollable and unstable. I was no exception... However, I lived to see the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to our world, which means I did not cause my jailers too much trouble, all things considered."

traits.locale_text: « La grande majorité des psykers, lorsqu'ils découvrent leurs pouvoirs, sont en effet incontrôlables et instables. Je n'ai pas fait exception à la règle... J'ai néanmoins survécu jusqu'à l'arrivée du {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Vaisseau Noir{/g} sur notre monde, ce qui veut bien dire que, tout compte fait, je n'ai pas causé trop d'ennuis à mes geôliers. »

languages.text: "Yeni keşfedilen ruhsezerlerin ekseriyeti, son derece dengesiz ve zapt edilmezdir. Ben de öyleydim. Ha... {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Kara Gemi{/g}, dünyamıza yanaştı da bizimkilerin başına öyle aman aman dertler açmadım."
languages.original_text: "The vast majority of newly discovered psykers are extremely uncontrollable and unstable. I was no exception... However, I lived to see the arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShip}Black Ship{/g} to our world, which means I did not cause my jailers too much trouble, all things considered."
